about_me.des: Passionné par les nouvelles technologies dont particulièrement l'informatique, la biotechnologie et la robotique, je suis un développeur qui aime travailler avec les langages objet et le web.

projects.gonramp: G-Onramp is a project to engage biologists with Big Data using interactive genome annotation. Built as Galaxy Project team member
projects.jscoverageqc: JsCoverageQC is a port, from Java to ReactJS, of a next generation sequencing (NGS) quality control (QC) report generator. Built as Freelancer for Galaxy Project.
projects.pousse_de_bambin: Pousse De Bambin is a website for parents to create and share the birthlist of their coming newborn. Built as CEO/CTO, in the startup incubator EM Lyon.

cbi.name: George Washington University, Computational Biology Institute, Galaxy Project, Washington D.C., USA
cbi.description: Main developer of G-OnRamp: Engaging Biologists with Big Data Using Interactive Genome Annotation (DOI: 10.6084/m9.figshare.3456203). #Galaxy Project, #Python, #Cheetah, #Computational Biology, #Genome Browser
cbi.position: Senior Research Associate - BioInformatics Software Engineer

cruk.name: Cancer Research UK, Cambridge, UK
cruk.description: Bring the Galaxy instances of the Galaxy Project to a robust and efficient production level, with CRUK cluster job submissions. Add tools in the instance and train CRUK members and students to use Galaxy. #Galaxy Project, #Python, #Linux, #Unix Shell

freelance.name: Marenco Freelancing, Europe (France, Czech Republic, UK)
freelance.description: Port from #Java to #Javascript/#ReactJS a quality control generator (QC) for next generation sequencing data (JsCoverageQC). Client:Galaxy Project. Efficient gigs #Java #JSF 1.2 development on an #AS400. Teaching Assistant professor in the Engineering school CPE: #C/#Websites

hospitals_lyon.name: University Hospitals of Lyon, France
hospitals_lyon.description: Rewrite core modules for the new architecture (#ASP.Net MVC 5/#Knockout.js/#Bootstrap 3). Maintain legacy module (#ASP.Net MVC 4/#Bootstrap 2).

pousse_de_bambin.name: 'Pousse De Bambin' Startup - EM Lyon Incubator, France
pousse_de_bambin.description: CEO of Pousse De Bambin birthlist website, in the EM Lyon business school incubator. Manage a team of 5 people (including volunteers). #ASP.Net MVC 4/5, #Microsoft Azure, #jQuery, #Knowckout.js. #Trello/#MS Project

graduation_engineer.name: Software Engineer Graduation, CPE Lyon, France
graduation_engineer.description: Alternate between full-time study and full-time work in a company. Specialization in computer science, networks and telecommunications.
graduation_engineer.position: Computer Engineer diploma of higher education - Cooperative Education

galaxy_intern.name: Galaxy Project, Emory, Atlanta, GA, U.S.A
galaxy_intern.description: Fix bugs, add tools, implement new functionalities (#Python/#Mako/#Git). Champion and prototype Galaxy Biostar (#Django).

graduation_bachelor.name: Professional Bachelor's Degree - Cooperative Education, Lyon, France
graduation_bachelor.description: Alternate between full-time study and full-time work in a company. Specialization in computer systems and software.

graduation_dut.name: DUT Graduation, IUT A, Lyon, France
graduation_dut.description: DUT is a two year intensive university diploma. Specialization in Computer Science, Software engineering
